long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the new tool, Gengo Job  Notifier, Chrome extension crafted exclusively for authorized Gengo translators to boost translation efficiency.

Greetings, Gengo translators! I'm thrilled to announce a suite of updates to the Gengo Job Notifier that are sure to enhance your translating workflow. Here's what's here:

ðŸš€ Features & Improvements in Version 1.1

- **New Feature!** - **Support for Real-Time Dashboard**: The extension fully supports the new Real-Time Dashboard functionality on the official Gengo Dashboard.
- **Rapid Refresh Cycle:** Your notifier refreshes every **60 seconds**, keeping you up-to-the-minute with new job postings.
- **Customizable Job Values:** Set your own thresholds for job values to tailor the notifications to your preferences.
- **Chrome System Notifications:** Stay informed without interruption with seamless Chrome notifications.
- **Exclusive Access:** This update is dedicated strictly to authorized Gengo translators who have access to the official job dashboard.

I am committed to empowering Gengo translators with tools that make a difference. Your feedback is the cornerstone of my tool development, so please share your thoughts and experiences with me. Let's continue to elevate the translation community together!
